first_para: Andrew Peter Miller (born 23 March 1949) is a British Labour Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ellesmere Port and Neston from 1992 to 2015.

full.extract:
Andrew Peter Miller (born 23 March 1949) is a British Labour Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ellesmere Port and Neston from 1992 to 2015.
^ http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm/cmregmem/110124/part2.htm
full.title: Andrew Miller (politician)
